text.div:
Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis B virus e Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13954-3 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    31844-4 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Presence] in Serum
    31845-1 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Units/volume] in Serum
    32178-6 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Titer] in Serum
    39007-0 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    5191-2 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay
    5192-0 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Presence] in Serum by Radioimmunoassay (RIA)
    75408-5 Hepatitis B virus e Ag [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
